Articles.Content:
It would be really handy if we got a horizontal variant of the hitchhiker container (and lab if that will make it into KSP2).

This way people can make planes and rovers out of 2.5m parts without making kerbals awkwardly sit sideways.


This, alongside a 2.5m cockpit (something more aerodynamic than the cupola, more comparable to the mk1 or mk3 cockpit) would allow players to make the most out of the 2.5m part size.
